body: Every weekday morning, Lillian Lopez, who lives in a Brooklyn housing project, escorts her 14-year-old daughter, Sherie, on one of the most dangerous parts of the girl's route to school where muggings and worse are common: the elevator ride down from their 10th-floor apartment. body: New York City detectives are looking for two suspects who they believe carried out a 14-hour robbery spree in Brooklyn in which they shot three people, killing two of them and wounding the third, a Methodist minister.
